name: Kirk BARD, Petitioner v. Thomas CORBETT, et al. and Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Respondents

parties: Kirk BARD, Petitioner v. Thomas CORBETT, et al. and Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of November, 2008, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
961 A.2d 51
Kirk BARD, Petitioner v. Thomas CORBETT, et al. and Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Respondents.
No. 136 EM 2008.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 17, 2008.
